response.original_title: You're Dreaming While Taking A Mid-July Afternoon Nap In 2000 With The Ceiling Fan On
response.overview: A visual video re-enactment of a dream, simulating the moment you've entered the dream state to when you suddenly wake up from a nightmare.
response.title: You're Dreaming While Taking A Mid-July Afternoon Nap In 2000 With The Ceiling Fan On
